CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Candidate__r.Career_Presentation_Date_Scheduled__c)), Candidate__r.Career_Presentation_Date_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), Candidate__r.Career_Presentation_Date_Scheduled__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Candidate__r.SI_3_Scheduled__c)), Candidate__r.SI_3_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), Candidate__r.SI_3_Scheduled__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Candidate__r.SI_2_Date_Scheduled__c)), Candidate__r.SI_2_Date_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), Candidate__r.SI_2_Date_Scheduled__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Candidate__r.SI_1_Date_Scheduled__c)), Candidate__r.SI_1_Date_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), Candidate__r.SI_1_Date_Scheduled__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Candidate__r.Attraction_Interview_Date_Scheduled__c)), Candidate__r.Attraction_Interview_Date_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), Candidate__r.Attraction_Interview_Date_Scheduled__c, NULL ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Next Meeting Date
